songs.title: 20 Hoes
songs.lyrics:
[Refrain: Young Thug & Future]
What the fuck ya thought
What the fuck ya, what (Yeah, yeah)
What the fuck ya thought
What the fuck ya thought (Super, let's go)
Outline you with chalk
Nigga what is this about (Let's go)
Four hours in, I already got the mouth

[Verse: Future]
Hustlers, gamblers, with scammers and strippers
We poppin' on X, we drankin' on chemicals
This for El Chapo, this for El Pablo
This Fidel Castro, 'til this green go faster
Polar bear, Alaska, pure white cracka'
Lean make me hyphy, I got a lil' light ice, someone don't take me lightly
I was on the block all day long, servin' whitey
I done seen a whole lot of niggas need fed indictment
The first check I ever had, man I flexed it insane
First bill I ever bought, I still got it today
Ever since I traded my bitch off, I'm in very good shape
George Jetson when I left off, you can look at my plates
Fuck my enemies, 20 Gs, they'll never be safe
Got a bitch naked on a Chanel coat, yeah
Bought ten chains for my little bro, yeah
20 rings look like brass knuckles, yeah
Man I came up from a grass cutter, yeah
Young nigga gangbangin', manslaughter, yeah
Servin' junkies in front of my grandmother, yeah
She affiliated with drug smugglers, yeah
I'm a headache to society
Real shit, Kylie Jenner, that's a side piece (Woo)
Yeah, I got 20 mothafuckin' Kylies (Woo)
Nigga, I got 20 damn Kylies (Woo)

[Bridge: Young Thug & Future]
I'ma headache to society
Real shit, I got 50 thousand dime pieces
I got 20 damn 'Rikas (I got 20)
And they all hate the nigga from 'chevious (Hey)
I got 20, 20 damn Kylies (Woo)
I got, 20, 20 grams of Molly
I got, I got 20 big bodies (Woo)
I got 20 bitches outside (Hey)

[Refrain: Young Thug]
What the fuck ya thought
What the fuck ya, what
What the fuck ya thought
What the fuck ya thought
Outline you with chalk
Nigga what is this about
Four hours in, I already got the mouth

[Outro: Young Thug]
I got 20 damn Kylies
20, 20 damn Kylies
I got 20 damn Kylies
Hm, ayy
